segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, and I feel a sense of sadness wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a waste, and the woman doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s going to be such a mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s just heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there with him, waiting for her share, and it’s all just so bittersweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely absorbed in drying dishes, unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of helplessness, like I want to reach out and fix everything, but I can’t.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is filled with a sense of melancholy, and I can’t shake it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everything turns out okay in the end.
segments.speaker: PAR
